view.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse
view.subtitle: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

blocks.title: Adversary Hold Abuse completed
blocks.message: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Commission configuration per provider (60% to stylist, 40% to salon)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
